name: All new workers inducted on to site and signed SWMS and Risk Assessments?
Are all site specific permits filled out for today's activities? (Hot works, roof access, working at heights, confined space, excavation, etc)
EWPs, Fall Protection and Electrical gear inspected, up to date, and safe for use?
All workers have suitable PPE for all tasks to be performed today?
All workers instructed in relation to today's work requirements?
Are all other trades/public notified of relevant activities in their area?
Daily assessment of work areas carried out?
Weather conditions appropriate for commencement of works?
Is there a SWMS in place for all specific activities commencing today?
Work area safe to commence works?
